The President signed the bill and it became law.
S. 885 (113th) was a bill in the United States Congress.
A bill must be passed by both the House and Senate in identical form and
then be signed by the President to become law.
Bills numbers restart every two years. That means there are other bills
with the number S. 885. This is the one from the 113^th Congress.
This bill was introduced in the 113^th Congress, which met from Jan 3,
